name: Claustrophobia (itch)
description:
Hordes of friendly zombies huggers are coming for you. But... you are quite claustrophobic. And you dont like zombies.
Kill as many zombies as possible but, be carefull, if you get to close to too many zombies, or to their corpse, your SANITY will decrease. If it reaches 0, it's Game Over.

Aim for the highest score!

[ INPUTS ]

W/A/S/D or UP/LEFT/DOWN/RIGHT => Move

LEFT CLICK => Shoot (aim with the mouse cursor)

RIGHT CLICK => "Megalazor"  (aim with the mouse cursor) (only when charged)
The Megalazor charge depending on your Sanity. The lower your Sanity is, the faster it charges.

[ GOAL ]

Try to score as high as you can.

You lose if your Sanity reaches 0. Your sanity decreases depending on the number of enemies, corpses or walls that are close to your character.

- - -

Oh and... unfortunately, their no music, I wanted to make one, but I was running out of time...
Same for two very little features i wanted to add : **showing the score on game over screen** and slightly random pitch some sound effects. It would have taken only a few minutes to do it but that's the game :D

Hope you'll enjoy plying this as much as I enjoyed making it!
